Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: I had a very bad experience from the beginning. Firstly i have recharged my wallet and tried booking train tickets. On the final stage, when i was supposed to make payment, the irctc app declined my transaction due to insufficient balance, were as i had enough balance for the payment. I treid several times, but the transaction was declined and as a result I couldn't book my ticket anymore and wasted precious time and effort. On the other hand i booked the train ticket through paytm hassle-free and speedy way. Then i requested the mobikwik customer to refund my money back to bank, it took around 10 days to resolve the issue after several email exchange. The second issue was same, i was trying to book ticket through irctc and the transaction was declined due to insufficient balance in mobikwik, were as i had enough balance in spite, the transaction was declined. When i requested the mobikwik customer to refund my money to bank back, they respond very very late and still its been 10 days, my money is in wallet struck up with no use and am waiting to get my money back. Why do you guys have customer service centre, why do u guys have tech team or any other when you cant solve a simple issue for about 10 days. I believe there is no issue in world would need 10 days to just process bank reversal, as you can do yourself in paytm. My humble request to all mobikwik user, please do not use the mobikwik wallet balance for booking irctc, resulting your money will get struck up, you will not be able to pay the ticket price, and finally you will loose time for booking ticket which will result the availability of ticket get lost. Dear mobikwik team, you guys have too many user, you guys can do better but pls concentrate on solving issues, we don't have any thing in our heart to give you less stars or bad comments, its our frustration because of your mistakes and lackness.

Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: This is by far the worst app compared to the players in the market. And this "Supercash" thing is among the most stupid concepts ever. Make no mistake about it. You rather not give discounts than introducing this moronic supercash. To give you some background, I transacted close to 5.5k on Netmeds with Mobikwik where it was clearly stated you will get cashback of Rs 200 and not Supercash. When I made the transaction though, I received cashback in Supercash which you can use only 5% on every transaction. I cancelled the order and had about 5.5k in my mobikwik account. When I tried transferring it to the bank, they asked for a convenience fee of Rs 178. Its a joke. You don't give 1% interest on my Mobikwik balance but charge me a ridiculous convenience fee. Now I am forced to spend on Mobikwik because I need to use my balance. Among all mobile wallets, mobiwik is the shittiest. Period!

Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: I have been using Mobikwik for more than 2 years. Initially it was quite good. Money deducted from bank and not updated on Mobikwik was a common issue. Usually they refunded by 2 days. But alas times have changed. On September 30th, I lost Rs 4760 due to this issue. Now they have closed off all customer service number and email addresses, except the help portal in the app. Even if I raise a ticket there, nothing is actually saved, and not a single reply is received thereafter. We have options like Paytm, Freecharge, PhonePe etc. They might not give out tons of fake Supercash, but at least they don't steal like you do. Refund my Rs 4760, or else I will keep on posting on each of your Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter pages , exposing the thieving company you really are.To divert attention they will send a message by the feedback team ( like Vibhor Thakur below) but on replying to the feedback team, nothing actually happens. After 15 days its supposed to refund the amount. It did not happen. And now they are playing, complete your full kyc first. Still no reply on when they will send the team for kyc completion.

ReviewText: MaxGetMore is disabled! The one think I liked most with MobiKwik is redeeming MaxGetMore points. But it seems Mobikwik has disabled this permanently. I have been trying for the past few months, but it does not work. I am no longer able to redeem my maxgetmore points. Other than this, I don't like their supercash model. Already mobikwik gives less reward in the form of cashback, and this too is added as supercash. On top of it, they say that we cannot utilize more than 10% supercash for any transaction. so effective cash back is less than 1% most of the time. With this strategy, they are bound to lose more customers to competitors who are providing attractive cashbacks, some of them even deposit the cashback directly in our bank accounts. For mobikwik to remain competitive, they have to change their policy. otherwise, they wont exist in long term.

Plus when I uninstalled the app,they send as sms seeking a second chance with such insidious marketing ploy!

Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: I started to like this app and use it after a long gap but it has disappointed me over and again. it has the worst customer support.No email, no customer care number.You can only get help via app that too is pathetic.I will strongly advise everyone avoid using this app. PhonePe and Paytm are better options.

Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
ReviewText: Super cash is worst feature in which user has purchase scatch card on specified time.At a time one cannot get complete cashback amount. you will get only 10 rs out of which only 6rs will be added to wallet.people have have no time to waste for purchasing scartch card in bits daily. If the company don't interested in cashback then why to cheat app user.If you want cashback please don't use this app plz. This is my honest request. I am unable get back rs 80+ through cash back because of super cash. BAD BAD AND WORST APP FOR CASHBACK.
